text: Glochidion pitcairnense is a species of plant in the family Phyllanthaceae. It occurs only in the Henderson and Pitcairn Islands in the southern Pacific Ocean, with respective populations of approximately 20,000 and 500. ==References== pitcairnense Category:Flora of the Pitcairn Islands Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Glochidion pitcairnense
